data_description.host: The URL of the FlexMeasures instance.
data_description.username: The email to log in to the FlexMeasures instance.
data_description.password: The password to log in to the FlexMeasures instance.
data_description.power_sensor: The sensor that provides the power data.
data_description.consumption_price_sensor: The sensor that provides the consumption price data.
data_description.production_price_sensor: The sensor that provides the production price data. Can be the same as the consumption price sensor.
data_description.rm_discharge_sensor: The sensor that provides the resource manager discharge data.
data_description.schedule_duration: The duration of the schedule in minutes.
data_description.consumption_sensor_id: Sensor ID to record power consumption.
data_description.soc_unit: The unit of the state of charge.
data_description.soc_minima_sensor_id: Minimum SOC sensor ID as given by the different FRBC.StorageDescription messages.
data_description.soc_maxima_sensor_id: Maximum SOC sensor ID as given by the different FRBC.StorageDescription messages.
data_description.fill_level_sensor_id: Fill level sensor ID of the NES heat storage.
data_description.fill_rate_sensor_id: Fill rate sensor ID of the active actuator (THP or NES internal resitor).
data_description.thp_fill_rate_sensor_id: Fill rate sensor ID of the Tarnoc Heat Pump.
data_description.thp_efficiency_sensor_id: Tarnoc heat pump coeffient of performance (Thermal Power / Electrical Power).
data_description.nes_fill_rate_sensor_id: Fill rate sensor ID of the Nestore hot water storage internal thermal resistor.
data_description.nes_efficiency_sensor_id: Nestore internal resistor coeffient of performance (Thermal Power / Electrical Power).
